mapper.select: select * from lottery where userId=#{userId} order by awardId asc;

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from lottery where userId=#{userId} and awardId=#{awardId}
insert.if: update lottery set awardCount=awardCount+#{awardCount} where userId=#{userId} and awardId=#{awardId}
insert into lottery(userId, awardId, awardCount) values(#{userId}, #{awardId}, #{awardCount})

mapper.select: select awardCount from lottery where userId=#{userId} and awardId=#{awardId}
mapper.update: update lottery set awardCount=awardCount-1 where userId=#{userId} and awardId=#{awardId}
mapper.select: select id, userId, awardId, awardCount from readyLottery where userId=#{userId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
mapper.update: update readyLottery set awardCount=awardCount-#{awardCount} where userId=#{userId} and awardId=#{awardId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}

insert.selectKey: select count(id) from readyLottery where userId=#{userId} and awardId=#{awardId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
insert.if: update readyLottery set awardCount=awardCount+1 where userId=#{userId} and awardId=#{awardId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
insert into readyLottery(userId, awardId, awardCount, daystamp) values(#{userId}, #{awardId}, 1, #{daystamp})
